example.text: The humanitarian, national security and deadly drug crises at the southern border are all about to get much worse when the Biden administration lifts Title 42 in two days. The president's border and immigration policies have utterly failed. [[url]]

The LOCAL Infrastructure Act will help communities stretch dollars further to make upgrades & provide desired services that create economic opportunity and increase longevity. Proud to join [[user]] and a bipartisan group of colleagues on this bill. [[url]]

I was pleased to join [[user]] late last week and chat about the latest news from Washington as well my work on behalf of Arkansas. We went over the debt limit debate and covered my legislation on addressing the growing physician shortage and updating the VA's burial benefit. [[url]]

I was pleased to join Sens. Klobuchar and Crapo, along with other colleagues and Canadian Members of Parliament, for a Canada-US Interparliamentary Group meeting yesterday to discuss trade, agriculture and how to enhance our partnership for the benefit of both our nations. [[url]]
